name: Space Pets 2: Return of the Rodents
name_original: Space Pets 2: Return of the Rodents
description:
The mice are out of control! In their never-ending pursuit of cheddar, they have formed extra-terrestrial colonies to pillage the moon for its cheese! Play as Astra the Cat and Cosmo the Dog as they join forces to take down Darth Cheddar and foil his mining operations across the solar system’s moons - before it's too late!

Created for the 2022 Global Game Jam in just 48 hours!

Created By;

Mitchell, Keira, Omar and Daniel!
